name: Something Fishy (reksa)
description:
The game is fully playable with only a mouse.

This is a game about creating your own fish and then releasing them into the wild. You can create fish using the evolution screen, as seen below:

You can then spawn them in as fishes, spawn in plants for them to eat and gain experience as they devour the plants.

As I ran out of time, there are a lot of bugs, apologies in advance.
